pullrequest.title: parse model.config such that it allows <model><urdf>file.urdf</urdf></model>.

content.raw: I don't believe this change affects the model database at all - URDFs already could work in the model database, but as you said they probably should not be added unless you have ROS specific elements. This change is just semantic so you don't have <sdf>robot.urdf</sdf>
content.html: I don't believe this change affects the model database at all - URDFs already could work in the model database, but as you said they probably should not be added unless you have ROS specific elements. This change is just semantic so you don't have <sdf>robot.urdf</sdf>
